contentrichtext.text: {{BLP sources|date=July 2011}} {{Infobox Chinese-language singer and actor | image = | name = Vangie Tang | chinesename = | tradchinesename = 鄧穎芝 | simpchinesename = 邓颖芝 | pinyinchinesename = deng4 ying3 zhi1 | jyutpingchinesename = dang6 wing6 zi1 | birth_name = Gigi Tang Wing Chi (鄧穎芝) | origin = [[Hong Kong]] | birth_date = {{birth date and age|df=yes|1985|5|22}} | birth_place = Hong Kong | death_date = | othername = Vangie Tang | occupation = [[Singer]] | genre = [[Cantopop]] | instrument = [[Singing]] | voicetype = | label = [[Sony Music]] | yearsactive = 2004-present | spouse = | partner = | children = | parents = | influences = | influenced = | website = | hongkongfilmwards = | goldenbauhiniaawards = | hkfcsawards = | goldenhorseawards = | goldenroosterawards = | ntsawards = | awards = }} ''' Vangie Tang Wing-chi ''' ({{zh|t=鄧穎芝}}, born 22 May 1985) is a [[Hong Kong]] [[singer]]. She is a top 8 finalist of the 22nd annual [[New Talent Singing Awards]]<ref>{{cite web|url=http://tvcity.tvb.com/special/newtalent2003/profile/05.html/|title=2003全球華人新秀歌唱大賽|publisher=[[TVB]]|language=Chinese|accessdate=14 July 2011}}</ref> in 2003. She is signed to [[Sony Music]] of Hong Kong since 2004. She entered the 2003 International Chinese New Talent Singing Championship - Hong Kong Regional Finals and became a top 8 finalist. Afterwards, her talents were discovered by C C To (杜自持), and under his tutelage, she was signed to Sony Music. Her debut album '''Glass Shoes''' was released on 3 December 2004. Her second album '''V2''' was released on 8 December 2005. Her third album '''Summer Never Ends''' will be released in October 2007. ==References== {{Reflist}} == External links == *[http://hk.myblog.yahoo.com/vforvangie/ Vangie's Yahoo Blog] (in Chinese) *[http://tvcity.tvb.com/special/newtalent2003/profile/05.html/ 2003 New Talent Singing Awards Contestant Profile] (in Chinese) *[http://www.vangie-tang.com/ VangieTang BBS] (in Chinese) *[http://post.baidu.com/f?kw=%B5%CB%D3%B1%D6%A5/ 百度貼吧_鄧穎芝吧] (in Chinese) *[http://hk.groups.yahoo.com/group/vangie530/ VanGiE House] (in Chinese) *[http://web.archive.org/web/20071116110128/http://hk.geocities.com/vangie_station/ VAN仔站] (in Chinese) *[http://web.archive.org/web/20090728191910/http://hk.geocities.com/lovevangiehome/ Love Vangie] (in Chinese) {{Persondata <!-- Metadata: see [[Wikipedia:Persondata]]. --> | NAME =Tang, Vangie | ALTERNATIVE NAMES = | SHORT DESCRIPTION = Hong Kong singer | DATE OF BIRTH =22 May 1985 | PLACE OF BIRTH =Hong Kong | DATE OF DEATH = | PLACE OF DEATH = }} {{DEFAULTSORT:Tang, Vangie}} [[Category:Cantopop singers]] [[Category:1985 births]] [[Category:Living people]]
